profile.name: Ramani Mahidara
profile.title: Certified Salesforce Administrator
profile.organization: Access Intelligence, MD | 4+ Years Experience | Mason, OH

bio.introduction: Certified Salesforce Administrator with over 4 years of experience driving 30% efficiency gains through automation and optimization of Salesforce Sales Cloud and Service Cloud. Expert in configuration, automation, and integrations with proven track record of reducing manual effort by 25% and improving forecasting accuracy by 25%.
bio.background: Skilled in developing Flows, Process Builder, Workflow Rules, and Apex triggers to streamline operations and ensure scalability. Strong expertise in data integrity management using Data Loader and DemandTools, and advanced reporting and analytics through Salesforce Dashboards, Google Looker Studio, and BigQuery.
bio.researchFocus: Proven success in driving business impact by integrating third-party applications such as Conga, Adobe Sign, and Accounting Seed to automate contracts, proposals, and financial workflows. Recognized for delivering measurable results including 35% faster case resolution, 30% reduced quote errors, and 20% improved conversion rates while aligning Salesforce solutions with organizational goals.

publications.title: Salesforce Administrator
publications.description:
25% Manual Effort Reduction30% Quote Error Reduction20% Conversion Boost40% Faster Reporting

Key Achievements:
• Optimized Salesforce operations by administering Sales Cloud (user roles, territories, profiles, workflows, Lightning pages) and integrating Adobe Sign, Conga, and Accounting Seed—streamlining processes and cutting manual effort by 25%
• Enhanced sales efficiency through Product & Price Book management, reducing quote errors by 30%, automating lead-to-quote workflows, and implementing sales engagement cadences that boosted prospect conversion by 20%
• Drove process automation by designing and migrating workflows/process builders into advanced Flows (record-triggered, screen, scheduled), eliminating 90% of legacy workflow issues and ensuring scalability
• Delivered actionable insights via Salesforce reports, DemandTools data integrity management, and Google Looker dashboards (Sales Goals, Forecasting, Revenue Pacing), improving forecasting accuracy by 25% and reducing executive reporting time by 40%

Key Achievements:
• Administered and optimized Salesforce Sales & Service Cloud, managing user roles, security, workflows, and automation to streamline operations—improving platform adoption by 20% and reducing manual effort by 25%
• Enhanced customer support efficiency by configuring case management (queues, email-to-case, escalation rules) and automating service processes, reducing case resolution time by 30% and boosting customer satisfaction scores by 15%
• Delivered data-driven insights by ensuring data integrity and building custom reports/dashboards, while training users and gathering requirements—increasing reporting accuracy by 25% and driving higher user adoption

Key Achievements:
• Automated Salesforce workflows by developing Process Builder flows, Apex triggers, approval processes, and business logic rules—streamlining operations, reducing manual tasks by 30%, and improving process efficiency by 25%
• Customized and maintained Salesforce CRM (Sales & Service Cloud) with Visualforce pages, custom objects, security controls, validation rules, and large-scale data migrations using Data Loader and SQL Server—ensuring 99% data accuracy and system stability
• Delivered insights and adoption by building reports/dashboards, cleansing data, and conducting stakeholder sessions—boosting reporting accuracy by 20% and increasing user adoption by 15%

projects.title: Salesforce Sales Cloud Optimization & Automation
projects.shortDescription: Achieved 30% reduction in quote errors and 20% conversion boost through comprehensive Sales Cloud optimization.
projects.detailedDescription:
30% Quote Error Reduction20% Conversion Boost25% Forecasting Accuracy40% Faster Reports

Administered and customized Salesforce Sales & Service Cloud (users, roles, profiles, record types, security, custom objects) while designing advanced automations (Flows, Process Builder, Workflow, Approvals) to streamline lead management, opportunity tracking, and Product & Price Book setup. Delivered data-driven insights by building Reports, Dashboards, and Google Looker Studio visualizations with BigQuery, improving revenue forecasting accuracy by 25% and cutting executive reporting time by 40%.

projects.title: Salesforce Service Cloud Process Automation
projects.shortDescription: Reduced case resolution time by 35% through comprehensive Service Cloud automation.
projects.detailedDescription:
35% Faster Resolution15% Platform AdoptionEmail-to-Case AutomationImproved Compliance

Configured and maintained Service Cloud (Case workflows, Email-to-Case, queues, escalation/assignment rules) to streamline customer support, reducing case resolution time by 35%. Developed automation solutions with Flows, Process Builders, and outbound messages for campaign management, approvals, and email alerts. Ensured data integrity and adoption using DemandTools & Data Loader for cleansing/migration and conducting user training sessions, resulting in 15% higher platform adoption and improved compliance.

projects.title: Enterprise Flow Migration & Process Automation
projects.shortDescription: Eliminated 90% of legacy workflow issues through strategic Flow migration.
projects.detailedDescription:
90% Issue ReductionEnhanced Scalability25% Process EfficiencyZero Technical Debt

Designed and migrated old workflows and process builders into modern Salesforce Flows, creating various types including screen flows, record-triggered flows, and scheduled flows. Modified existing process builders to meet new business requirements while ensuring optimal performance and maintainability. This migration improved system performance, reduced technical debt significantly, and positioned the platform for future scalability.

projects.title: Enterprise Data Integrity Management
projects.shortDescription: Achieved 99% data accuracy through comprehensive data quality initiatives.
projects.detailedDescription:
99% Data AccuracyZero DuplicatesLarge-Scale MigrationDemandTools Expert

Maintained data integrity by leveraging Data Loader for large-scale data cleansing, transformation, and migration activities. Worked on all modules of DemandTools including Import, Update, Dedupe, Delete, Reassign, Modify & Transform to maintain data integrity in Salesforce. Implemented strategies for ongoing data quality management and duplicate prevention, ensuring 99% data accuracy across the platform.

projects.title: Executive Analytics Dashboard Suite
projects.shortDescription: Reduced executive reporting time by 40% with real-time Looker Studio dashboards.
projects.detailedDescription:
40% Faster ReportingReal-time AnalyticsC-Suite Dashboards25% Better Forecasting

Designed and deployed Google Looker Studio dashboards utilizing BigQuery for diverse stakeholders, including C-suite, Sales, and Marketing teams. Developed interactive dashboards for Sales Goals, Budget & Forecast Pipeline, and Revenue Pacing. Translated complex data into clear visualizations that improved forecasting accuracy by 25% and reduced executive reporting time by 40%.

projects.title: Multi-System Integration & Automation Hub
projects.shortDescription: Automated contract and proposal workflows, cutting processing time by 50%.
projects.detailedDescription:
50% Faster Processing3+ System IntegrationsZero Manual ErrorsAutomated Workflows

Managed Adobe Sign integration and contract templates in Salesforce. Maintained Conga Managed Package solutions to streamline proposal generation and contract templates. Integrated Salesforce with external Sales system for automated commission payments. Created workflow processes for Accounting Seed, eliminating manual errors and reducing processing time by 50%.

projects.title: User Training & Platform Adoption Program
projects.shortDescription: Drove 20% increase in platform adoption through comprehensive training program.
projects.detailedDescription:
20% Adoption Increase100+ Users TrainedComplete DocumentationOngoing Support

Conducted training sessions for onboarding new users and feature adoption to existing Salesforce users. Developed and maintained comprehensive documentation on processes, policies, and help materials. Led stakeholder meetings to identify problems, resolve issues, and improve processes, resulting in 20% higher platform adoption and improved user satisfaction.
